title: 【尸晓}第4章——如果还有黎明
txt_content:
本帖最后由 345597107 于 2013-11-23 21:06 编辑 

你们人类真是不可饶恕，我一忍再忍你们，既然你们怎么想死，那我就送你们一程吧！————斯莱特
故事接上集
                                                                                  黎明就要来了吗？
那只怪物越来越大，已经快要把太阳的光线挡住了。怪物发出的阵阵咆哮声更是惊天动地，下的NITS小队的成员大气都不敢出，“这是……什么鬼东西啊，这么怎么吓人。"施特颤抖的说到“这应该是某种变异体”“可是变异体也没有怎么大，而且攻击力也超过了普通变异体的80倍”还没有等他们想明白是怎么一回事的时候，一个铺天盖地的巨型爪子向他们飞来……
库斯：快闪啊！
施特：快卧倒！
布斯：不，快蹲下！
一个爪子飞来了，把他们三人全部打飞在空中，又重重的摔在地上。
施特：看吧……全部人……都卧倒了……全都……没有事……我的……办法更……有效……
莉娜：都这时候了还说这个。。。
库斯：布斯怎么样了，还有，其他人怎么样了
莉娜：其他人都没事，就是布斯…………
库斯：布斯怎么样了
莉娜：布斯那可怜的娃，你们是撞在肉掌上而他是撞在利爪上……而且谁叫他要蹲下，正好被爆头了……
库斯：噗哈哈哈哈哈
莉娜：不过还好，伤的不重，没有什么大碍
神秘人：要说什么到地狱里去说吧！
系统：正在发动围墙上的重机枪……
库斯：什么？
施特:重机枪？
系统：发动成功！
神秘人：启动！
一阵机枪扫射的声音。
施特：我们是不是在天堂
库斯：应该不是
轰，什么东西倒下了。
库斯：我们没有在天堂，机枪全部打向怪兽了，哈哈哈哈
神秘人：别着急，改轮到你们了
库斯：神秘人，我们有话好好说，干嘛要动粗啊，我们都是人类，我们为什么不一起打僵尸啊，多带劲啊。
神秘人：（深思熟虑……）
库斯：哈，有动静了，我们有救了
神秘人：谁说你们有救了，我只是忘了启动机枪的密码而已。。。。。
库斯瞬间石化（零滴血求桃中）
神秘人：想起来了，你们玩蛋了
说完，空中响起了一阵直升机的声音
？？？：神秘人，投降吧…………
                                                                                                           ————未完待续


以下是英文版
You humans are unforgivable, I endure to endure you, now what do you want to die, then I can give you a ride! -- -- Slater
Story connected to set
The dawn is coming?
The monster is more and more big, already is going to hold up the light of the sun. Under blast a roar from the monster is astounding, NITS atmosphere all dare not out of the team members, \"this is what the heck... ah, how so scary.\" Trembling straw said \"it's supposed to be some kind of variant\" \"but I did not how big variants, and damage is more than 80 times of common variants\" has not yet when they want to know what's the same thing, a flood of the claws of a giant they fly...
Library: flash!
Straw: come down!
Booth: no, squat down quickly!
A paw to fly, all three of them fly in the sky, and hard fall on the ground.
Straw: see... All people... Hit the... All...... No matter... I...... More... Effective...
Lina: all this time also say this...
Library: how about the booth, and others
Lina: \"all right, others is the booth............
Library: booth
Lina: booth that poor child, you are crashed into the palm of meat and he was hit on the claws... And who told him to keep down, just to be a head...
Library: poof ha ha ha ha ha
Lena: but it's good, not heavy, no what matter
Mystery man: what to say to hell to say!
System: is a heavy machine guns on the wall...
, : what?
Straw: heavy machine guns?
System: a success!
Mystery man: start!
The voice of a machine gun.
Straw: are we in the heaven
Library: it should not be
Boom, what went down.
, : we don't have in heaven, machine guns full play to the monster, ha ha ha ha
Mystery man: don't worry, it's your turn
Library: mystery man, we have the words to say, why the rough ah, we are all human, why don't we play zombie ah, how wonderful.
Mystery man: [thoughtful...)
Library: ha, some movement, we has been already saved
Mystery man: who say you has been already saved, I just forget to start the machine guns password...
Peach, instantly petrochemical (zero blood o)
Mystery man: remember, you play the egg
Say that finish, the air there was a helicopter's voice
????? Mystery man, surrender............
-- - to be continued
有点走搞笑路线了。。。。。
